results.deck: A Japanese Kinect title that features logic and memory puzzles. It stars Dr. Kawashima of Brain Age fame.
results.name: Body and Brain Connection

results.deck: A post-apocalyptic gladiator arena filled with zombies with attitudes and armored war machines sets the stage in Blood Drive.
results.name: Blood Drive

results.deck: Developed exclusively for Kinect, the Biggest Loser includes new features, such as video diaries and online workout friends.
results.name: The Biggest Loser Ultimate Workout

results.deck: Backyard Sports: Rookie Rush marks the second title released featuring the new look and feel of the Backyard Sports franchise
results.name: Backyard Sports: Rookie Rush

results.deck: Game Party: In Motion is an exclusive game for Kinect with arcade, sports, and party games for all ages.
results.name: Game Party: In Motion

results.deck: A new entry in THQ's MX vs. ATV series. It is not a squad-based, class-based, tactical stealth action game.
results.name: MX vs. ATV Alive

results.deck: UFC Personal Trainer aims to train players by using a variety of training techniques utilized by UFC superstars. The game will take advantage of the Kinect and PlayStation Move accessories.
results.name: UFC Personal Trainer

results.deck: As demon hunter Garcia "F**king" Hotspur, players must venture into Hell itself in order to rescue Paula, Garcia's innocent girlfriend, from the sadistic torments of Fleming, the Lord of Demons.
results.name: Shadows of the Damned

results.deck: Capcom's Devil May Cry series gets a stylish new reboot from developer Ninja Theory, featuring a redesigned Dante and a new take on the franchise's fiction.
results.name: DmC Devil May Cry

results.deck: Ninja Gaiden 3 is the first main entry in the modern Ninja Gaiden series not to be directed by former Team Ninja head Tomonobu Itagaki. NG3 features new game mechanics, a focus on consequence and 8-player online modes.
results.name: Ninja Gaiden 3

results.deck: Asura's Wrath is an interactive anime action title that tells the tale of violent demigod Asura on a quest for vengeance against the cabal of gods that betrayed him.
results.name: Asura's Wrath

results.deck: This Kinect-focused sequel to Steel Battalion puts players in the enormous metal shoes of 'Vertical Tanks' in the year 2082, in the middle of a war that looks suspiciously like WWII with mechs.
results.name: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor

results.deck: A quasi-sequel to From Software's action-RPG Demon's Souls, set in a new universe while retaining most of the basic gameplay and the high level of challenge. It features a less-linear world, a new checkpoint system in the form of bonfires, and the unique Humanity system.
results.name: Dark Souls

results.deck: An on-rails shooter in which the player fights schoolgirls by shooting pheromones at them. Developed by Inti Creates for the 360 and PS3. Jeff Gerstmann approved.
results.name: Gal Gun

results.deck: A puzzle exploration game where players collect pollen to grow flowers and exotic plants through tunnels and caverns.
results.name: The UnderGarden

results.deck: Sega's Rise of Nightmares is a gesture controlled rail shooter designed exclusively for Kinect.
results.name: Rise of Nightmares

results.deck: Tekken's spin-off tag-team fighting game returns with a whopping 59 fighters from the series' history (all the way to Tekken 6).
results.name: Tekken Tag Tournament 2

results.deck: The feudal Chinese factions of Wu, Shu, and Wei (along with the new Jin Kingdom) return for another installment of tactical action and K.O. counts into the thousands!
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 7

results.deck: The first game in the popular racing franchise after the EA/NASCAR fallout. Developed by Eutechnyx.
results.name: NASCAR 2011: The Game

results.deck: An RTS based on the Hundred Years' War.
results.name: The History Channel: Great Battles - Medieval

results.deck: The third title in Koei's series of Dynasty Warriors-style gameplay set in the Gundam universe, boasting cel-shaded graphics and four-player online co-operative multiplayer.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 3

results.deck: Tying in to the 2011 film Captain America: The First Avenger, Super Soldier tells a side-story where the ultra-patriotic Steve Rogers takes the fight to the villainous HYDRA organization during World War II.
results.name: Captain America: Super Soldier

results.deck: X-Men RPG featuring a branching storyline which puts you in the shoes of a rookie X-Man, written by Mike Carey, who also wrote the X-Men: Legacy comic books.
results.name: X-Men: Destiny

results.deck: A hostess-club/dating simulator from the developer of Dream C Club, D3 Publisher Inc.
results.name: Dream C Club Zero

results.deck: A visual combination of Just Dance and Guitar Hero, Dance Paradise throws its Club Kid hat onto the swelling heap of Kinect powered dancing games.
results.name: Dance Paradise

results.deck: A vertical scrolling shooter for Xbox Live Indie Games.
results.name: Vampire Rage

results.deck: A shooter similar to Lunar Lander for Xbox Live Indie Games.
results.name: Gravitron360

results.deck: The third installment in the series sees a reluctant victim battling nature, pirates, and the island's insanity-inducing jungle to rescue his friends and family from an island paradise gone horribly wrong.
results.name: Far Cry 3

results.deck: Follow the exploits of Captain Cole Anderson as he tries to stop a bio-weapon being unleashed.
results.name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2

results.deck: The latest CSI game to be released for PC, Wii, 360 & PS3.  The game coincides with the 10th season of the hit TV show.
results.name: CSI: Fatal Conspiracy

results.deck: The third main installment in the match-three franchise.
results.name: Bejeweled 3

results.deck: The second pack of country songs feature 21 never-before-available tracks from Johnny Cash, Lady Antebellum, Rascal Flats, and more.  Songs will be exportable to Rock Band 3 and previous titles.
results.name: Rock Band Country Track Pack 2

results.deck: A top down, cartoony flight game where the player controls an aircraft to select answers for math, vocabulary, and geography questions.
results.name: Air Forte

results.deck: An action-adventure game based on the Gore Verbinski/Johnny Depp animated movie of the same name.
results.name: Rango: The Video Game

results.deck: A first person parkour game by EA in collaboration with Steven Spielberg that has been cancelled twice.
results.name: LMNO

results.deck: Two Crusaders fight armies of enemies in order to free their souls of a sinister curse in this upcoming action game from Kylotonn.
results.name: The Cursed Crusade

results.deck: The sequel to the original "reboot" of the TOCA Race Driver series, GRID (known as Racedriver: GRID outside of the US). It uses the same EGO 3.0 Engine which was used in Dirt 3 and employs a brand new system called "TrueFeel" which provides a balance between accessibility and realism.
results.name: GRID 2

results.deck: The true sequel to 2001's Divine Divinity, Divinity II: The Dragon Knight Saga is a remastered package containing an updated version of Divinity II: Ego Draconis and its expansion pack, Flames of Vengeance.
results.name: Divinity II: The Dragon Knight Saga

results.deck: The sequel to Piranha Bytes' action-RPG Risen. This time, there be pirates.
results.name: Risen 2: Dark Waters

results.deck: Major League Baseball 2K11 is Visual Concepts iteration of the MLB franchise for the 2011 MLB season and features the Dynamic Player Rating system that updates player ratings on recent real-world performance.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K11

results.deck: Radirgy Noa Massive is a vertically scrolling shooter from Milestone.
results.name: Radirgy Noa Massive

results.deck: Developed by Sidhe, the game includes all New Zealand leagues of Rugby, online multiplayer and extensive customisation options.
results.name: Rugby Challenge

results.deck: A popular Visual Novel by Akabei Soft2
results.name: Sharin no Kuni, Himawari no Shōjo

results.deck: 28 tracks appear in this European singing game.
results.name: The X Factor

results.deck: The game follows the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow and others from the movies. The title features characters and scenarios from all four films: The Curse of the Black Pearl, The Dead Man's Chest, At World's End and On Stranger Tides
results.name: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game

results.deck: A group of international soldiers take on an army of rogue androids in this sci-fi shooter set in 2080's Tokyo.
results.name: Binary Domain

results.deck: A free-to-play, online first-person shooter developed and published by Crytek.
results.name: Warface

results.deck: This UK-based release lets you toss darts at targets. Darts targets.
results.name: PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour

results.deck: A story-driven flight combat game set in World War II.
results.name: Air Conflicts: Secret Wars

results.deck: The sequel to Radical Entertainment's 2009 ultra-violent sandbox game, Prototype 2 returns to an urban landscape ravaged by an all-consuming virus.
results.name: Prototype 2

results.deck: Developed and published by Japanese game company Experience, this dungeon RPG follows a group of students out to slay a demon lord, a hundred years after another group of heroes failed to defeat it.
results.name: Students of the Round

results.deck: The sixth entry in the Snowboard Super X series that allows players to ride down real world mountains in dangerous weather conditions.
results.name: SSX

results.deck: The fifth installment in Bethesda's Elder Scrolls franchise is set in the eponymous province of Skyrim, where the ancient threat of dragons, led by the sinister Alduin, is rising again to threaten all mortal races. Only the player, as the prophesied hero the Dovahkiin, can save the world from destruction.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

results.deck: A horror game by Guillermo del Toro.
results.name: inSANE

results.deck: The latest main installment of Turn 10's racing franchise, released in Fall 2011.  It features 16 player online races, dynamic race conditions, cars from over 80 manufacturers, and compatibility with Kinect, both on and off the racetrack.
results.name: Forza Motorsport 4

results.deck: Idea Factory developed this Japan-only release for the Xbox 360 and put it on shelves in October of 2010.
results.name: Ore no Yome: Anata Dake no Hanayome

results.deck: A Wii game based on the television game show. It features the likeness of host Guy Fieri.
results.name: Minute to Win It

results.deck: The fourth mainline game in the Earth Defense Force series.
results.name: Earth Defense Force 2025

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 12 features a new "Caddie Experience," and for the first time ever, The Masters at Augusta National Golf Club.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 12: The Masters

results.deck: The 20th annual installment of EA Sports hockey, featuring the Winter Classic and an expanded physics engine.
results.name: NHL 12

results.deck: Multiple snowy sports are represented in this wintery package.
results.name: Winter Sports 2011: Go for Gold

results.deck: Four, four, four Dreamcast games in one!
results.name: Dreamcast Collection

results.deck: Telltale Games continue on from the events of the first Jurassic Park film with this cinematic adventure game.
results.name: Jurassic Park

results.deck: Final Fantasy XIII-2 is a direct sequel to Final Fantasy XIII released by Square Enix in early 2012.
results.name: Final Fantasy XIII-2

results.deck: A compilation of two Cave-developed vertical shmups. It was released on February 24, 2011.
results.name: Muchi Muchi Pork! & Pink Sweets

results.deck: A vertical shmup developed by 5pb for the Xbox 360. It was released on April 7, 2011.
results.name: Bullet Soul

results.deck: EA's long-running NFL series returns with its 2011 release, Madden NFL 12. It features Cleveland Browns running back Peyton Hillis on the cover, who won as a result of fan voting.
results.name: Madden NFL 12

results.deck: A vertical shmup developed by Cave and released in 2010. An Xbox 360 port was released February 3, 2011.
results.name: DoDonPachi Daifukkatsu Black Label

results.deck: A vertical shooter developed by Qute for the Xbox 360.
results.name: Eschatos

results.deck: In a distant, chaotic future, cyborgs beat the crap out of each other in this multiplayer-heavy 3D beat 'em up from the developers of MadWorld and Bayonetta.
results.name: Anarchy Reigns

results.deck: 2K's Wii minigame series is now on the Xbox 360 with Kinect support.
results.name: Carnival Games: Monkey See, Monkey Do!

results.deck: When betrayed and left to die by his posse, the undead Gunstringer seeks revenge in this marionette-inspired Kinect rail shooter.
results.name: The Gunstringer

results.deck: Michael Phelps: Push the Limit puts you in complete control of an up-and-coming swimmer entering the exciting and grueling world of competitive swimming in the hope of taking down Michael Phelps.
results.name: Michael Phelps: Push the Limit

results.deck: Crash through buildings and takedown the opposition in Bugbear's very different take on Namco's Ridge Racer franchise.
results.name: Ridge Racer Unbounded

results.deck: The Cartel is the third game in Ubisoft's Call of Juarez franchise, this time in a modern setting.
results.name: Call of Juarez: The Cartel

results.deck: Spyro and friends are toys come to life in this new 3D platformer from Toys for Bob and Activision.
results.name: Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure

results.deck: A Kinect-supported interactive storybook game that'll have kids and parents pretending to fly, jump, and dance.
results.name: Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster

results.deck: The current WSC game being developed and published by Dark Energy Sports for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC, with a planned release during Q2 2011.
results.name: World Snooker Championship Real 2011

results.deck: Cars 2 is a mission based driving game, similar to Mario Kart.
results.name: Cars 2: The Video Game

results.deck: An installment in Frogwares' series of adventure games based on Arthur Conan Doyle's stories. The good detective begins acting very strangely, coming into conflict with the law and his long-time friend Dr. Watson.
results.name: The Testament of Sherlock Holmes

results.deck: AFL live is the 2011 videogame version of the most popular sport in Australia - Australian Rules Football. It is the first time that Big Ant studios has made a fully fledged AFL game and the first AFL game on this generation of systems.
results.name: AFL Live

results.deck: The official tie-in to the movie of the same name, Rio is a party game featuring a colourful cast of animal characters.
results.name: Rio

results.deck: A World war 2 game That tells the story of Schwarzenberg. A a Nazi stronghold full of plundered treasure and secret weapon projects.
results.name: Schwarzenberg

results.deck: The Transformers: War for Cybertron developers bring a movie-tie in game for Transformers: Dark of the Moon to home and portable consoles.
results.name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon

results.deck: Presenting an original story in the same franchise as the comic book series of the same name, The Walking Dead is a five-part adventure game from Telltale that follows the story of a convicted murderer, his guardianship over a young girl, and his co-operation with a roaming group of survivors in a zombie apocalypse.
results.name: The Walking Dead

results.deck: A prequel to the Fables comic book series, The Wolf Among Us tells a tale of the reformed Big Bad Wolf of childhood folklore (who is the sheriff of a secluded community of fables in 20th century New York City) as he investigates a series of grisly murders.
results.name: The Wolf Among Us

results.deck: Akai Katana for Xbox 360 contains three different modes, including a port of the original arcade version of Akai Katana.
results.name: Akai Katana Shin

results.deck: The first visual novel developed by Cave for the Xbox 360. As a bonus the game includes Cave's famed vertical shooter DoDonPachi with Kinect support, and a new version of Nin²-Jump titled Nin²-Brain.
results.name: Instant Brain

results.deck: An updated version of Deathsmiles II: Makai no Merry Christmas, exclusive to the Xbox 360.
results.name: Deathsmiles IIX: Makai no Merry Christmas

results.deck: A vertical shoot 'em up developed by Cave and released in 2007.
results.name: Mushihime-sama Futari Black Label

results.deck: A collection of the three downloadable Alien Breed games originally distributed via XBLM and PSN.  Collected on one disk for retail sale.
results.name: Alien Breed Trilogy

results.deck: The fourth game in the Pia Carrot series.
results.name: Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! 4

results.deck: Motorcycles race each other for motorcycle supremacy in Capcom's latest motorcycle racing simulator.
results.name: MotoGP 10/11

results.deck: A 3DS game starring characters from a variety of Cartoon Network shows. A console version was released with additional characters and alternate costumes.
results.name: Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion

results.deck: Rocksmith is a guitar-based music game designed around playing a real electric guitar.
results.name: Rocksmith

results.deck: The annual college football release from EA Sports for the 2011-2012 season.  NCAA Football 12 will feature HDR rendering, Dynasty Mode improvements, custom playbooks and enhanced 3D field textures.
results.name: NCAA Football 12

results.deck: A racing game featuring 5-time Sprint Cup champion Jimmie Johnson, which (as the title suggests) lets you race anything with an engine. Even dumpsters.
results.name: Jimmie Johnson's Anything with an Engine

results.deck: The third entry in the Science Adventure series of visuals novels. Takes place in the near future and centers around high school students who attempt to build a real giant robot.
results.name: Robotics;Notes

results.deck: Race and destroy cars in this 3D destruction racing game from Left Field Productions.
results.name: Mayhem

results.deck: Undead Nightmare is a non-canon expansion pack to Red Dead Redemption that sees the main storyline get swept aside after the West becomes the setting for a zombie apocalypse, in which John Marston and his friends must fight for survival.
results.name: Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare
